option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. Before message add a conventional commit prefix. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation. Write each feature or fix description on the next line and begin with an asterisk to appear in markdown mode as a dotted list.

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: clean up workspace and add libargon2 in Dockerfile
Removed verbose comments from workspace.xml and added libargon2 to Dockerfile. * Cleared unnecessary commit message comments in .idea/workspace.xml. * Included libargon2 in Dockerfile for enhanced cryptographic support.

option.name: originalMessage
option.value:
fix(Dockerfile): update PostgreSQL dependency
Replaced `postgresql-dev` with `libpq-dev` to resolve build issues and added `unixodbc-dev`. * Ensures compatibility and enhances stability. * Configured pdo_odbc with unixODBC for improved database support. * Renamed build workflow file and updated paths for consistency.
fix(Dockerfile): update PostgreSQL dependency
Replaced `postgresql-dev` with `libpq-dev` to resolve build issues and added `unixodbc-dev`. * Ensures compatibility and enhances stability. * Configured pdo_odbc with unixODBC for improved database support.
fix(Dockerfile): update dependency for PostgreSQL development
Replaced `postgresql-dev` with `libpq-dev` to correct the dependency. * Ensures compatibility and resolves potential build issues. * Enhances the stability of Docker image builds.
fix: update workflow to use main docker build action
Removed the 'try-legacy' suffix from docker-build-n-push.yml reference. * Ensures the main Docker build and push action is utilized. * Enhances consistency across workflow configurations.
fix: correct path in build-image workflow
Fixed the relative path for the docker-build-n-push workflow in the build-image.yaml. * Changed the `uses` path to use the correct relative path format. * Ensured the build procedure points to the correct workflow file.
feat: Add GitHub Actions workflows for Docker builds
Introduce new GitHub Actions workflows and update configurations.
* Added build-image.yaml for managing Docker image builds on push, release, or workflow dispatch. * Introduced reusable docker-build-n-push.yml for Docker image building and pushing. * Updated .idea configuration to reflect new tasks and change lists. * Added PostgreSQL development library to Dockerfile. * Included pdo extension in Dockerfile.
feat: Add GitHub Actions workflows for building Docker images
Introduce new GitHub Actions workflows and update configurations.
* Added build-image.yaml for managing Docker image builds on push, release, or workflow dispatch. * Introduced reusable docker-build-n-push.yml for Docker image building and pushing. * Updated .idea configuration to reflect new tasks and change lists.

option.name: rewordedMessage
option.value:
fix: update .dockerignore and workspace.xml adjustments
* Added composer.lock and package-lock.json back to .dockerignore. * Improved Dockerfile dependencies management in workspace.xml. * Updated task comments and duration entries for accuracy. * Fixed php.ini timezone configuration in Dockerfile.
fix: update .dockerignore and workspace.xml adjustments
* Added composer.lock and package-lock.json back to .dockerignore. * Improved Dockerfile dependencies management in workspace.xml. * Updated task comments and duration entries for accuracy.
fix(workspace.xml): improve Dockerfile dependencies management
* Updated local task comments to enhance clarity. * Adjusted task duration entries for accurate metrics. * Corrected handling of specific Dockerfile dependency changes.
fix(Dockerfile): update dependencies and configurations
* Added `libbz2-dev`, `zlib1g-dev`, and `libxml2-dev` to address missing dependencies. * Updated GD configuration for PNG support and added `libxml`, `simplexml`, and removed `.phpize-deps` post-install. * Also reintroduced `mcrypt`, added `libedit` for enhanced functionality, and included `zlib`.
fix(Dockerfile): update dependencies and configurations
Added libbz2-dev, zlib1g-dev, and libxml2-dev to address missing dependencies. Updates include configuring GD for PNG support and adding libxml, simplexml, and removing .phpize-deps post-install. Also reintroduced mcrypt and added libedit for enhanced functionality.
fix(Dockerfile): update dependencies and configurations
Added libbz2-dev, zlib1g-dev, and libxml2-dev to address missing dependencies. Updates include configuring GD for PNG support and adding libxml, simplexml, and removing .phpize-deps post-install. ```
fix(Dockerfile): update PostgreSQL dependency
Replaced `postgresql-dev` with `libpq-dev` to resolve build issues and added `unixodbc-dev`. * Ensures compatibility and enhances stability. * Configured pdo_odbc with unixODBC for improved database support. * Renamed build workflow file and updated paths for consistency.
fix(Dockerfile): update PostgreSQL dependency
Replaced `postgresql-dev` with `libpq-dev` to resolve build issues and added `unixodbc-dev`. * Ensures compatibility and enhances stability. * Configured pdo_odbc with unixODBC for improved database support.
fix(Dockerfile): update dependency for PostgreSQL development
Replaced `postgresql-dev` with `libpq-dev` to correct the dependency. * Ensures compatibility and resolves potential build issues. * Enhances the stability of Docker image builds.
fix: update workflow to use main docker build action
Removed the 'try-legacy' suffix from docker-build-n-push.yml reference. * Ensures the main Docker build and push action is utilized. * Enhances consistency across workflow configurations.
fix: correct path in build-image workflow
Fixed the relative path for the docker-build-n-push workflow in the build-image.yaml. * Changed the `uses` path to use the correct relative path format. * Ensured the build procedure points to the correct workflow file.
feat: Add GitHub Actions workflows for Docker builds
Introduce new GitHub Actions workflows and update configurations.
* Added build-image.yaml for managing Docker image builds on push, release, or workflow dispatch. * Introduced reusable docker-build-n-push.yml for Docker image building and pushing. * Updated .idea configuration to reflect new tasks and change lists. * Added PostgreSQL development library to Dockerfile. * Included pdo extension in Dockerfile.
feat: Add GitHub Actions workflows for building Docker images
Introduce new GitHub Actions workflows and update configurations.
* Added build-image.yaml for managing Docker image builds on push, release, or workflow dispatch. * Introduced reusable docker-build-n-push.yml for Docker image building and pushing. * Updated .idea configuration to reflect new tasks and change lists.

task.summary: Default task

feat: Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
Included various configuration files to set up IntelliJ IDEA project environment. * Implement .gitignore for IDEA-specific files. * Define project encodings, Git blame settings, and JavaScript library mappings. * Configure PHP tools, PHPUnit settings, and SQL dialect mappings. * Add module definitions and source folder configurations.

chore: remove obsolete data source files
Deleted two unnecessary data source files from the project. * Removed .idea/dataSources/194d6ef2-6c15-4a2b-b4a5-70f03a353cbb/storage_v2/_src_/schema/app.IXoBAA.meta. * Deleted .idea/dataSources/84a42712-1bee-47b5-a29a-56c5c93c1ae6.xml.
refactor: InstallHandler rewrote

feat: Add compose-dev.yaml and update dependencies
Introduce a new development environment configuration.
* Added compose-dev.yaml for Docker development setup. * Updated Twig dependency in composer.lock to the latest version. * Refined .dockerignore to clean up ignored paths and include relevant cache directories and node modules. * Simplified workspace.xml in .idea by removing unnecessary changes and outdated entries.

feat: Add GitHub Actions workflows for building Docker images
Introduce new GitHub Actions workflows and update configurations.
* Added build-image.yaml for managing Docker image builds on push, release, or workflow dispatch. * Introduced reusable docker-build-n-push.yml for Docker image building and pushing. * Updated .idea configuration to reflect new tasks and change lists.

Added libbz2-dev, zlib1g-dev, and libxml2-dev to address missing dependencies. Updates include configuring GD for PNG support and adding libxml, simplexml, and removing .phpize-deps post-install. ```

fix: update Dockerfile dependencies and workspace XML
Enhanced Dockerfile to address missing dependencies and updated workspace.xml for task accuracy.
* Added `libxpm-dev` and `libwebp-dev` to Dockerfile. * Configured GD with additional support for various libraries. * Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` for improved task management.

feat: add libfreetype6 to Dockerfile dependencies
This change ensures that libfreetype6 is available, which is necessary for projects requiring font rendering capabilities. * Added libfreetype6 to the list of installed packages.

feat(Dockerfile): add libfreetype6 to dependencies**
Ensures libfreetype6 is available for projects requiring font rendering capabilities. * Added libfreetype6 to the list of installed packages. * Updated Dockerfile GD configuration to use newer compatibility settings. * Adjusted `.idea/workspace.xml` for improved task management.

feat(Dockerfile): streamline PHP extension installation
Simplified the installation of PHP extensions by using a single ARG for the extension list.
* Consolidated extensions into a single ARG EXT_LIST for better manageability. * Updated Dockerfile to use the ARG EXT_LIST in the docker-php-ext-install and docker-php-ext-enable commands. * Adjusted `.idea/workspace.xml` to improve task management.

feat(Dockerfile): streamline PHP extension installation
Simplified the installation of PHP extensions by using a single ARG for the extension list. * Consolidated extensions into a single ARG EXT_LIST for better manageability. * Updated Dockerfile to use the ARG EXT_LIST in the docker-php-ext-install and docker-php-ext-enable commands. * Adjusted `.idea/workspace.xml` to improve task management.

feat(Dockerfile): add shmop to PHP extensions
Added shmop to the list of installed PHP extensions. This enhances shared memory operations and improves PHP project capabilities. * Updated Dockerfile to include shmop in PHP extensions. * Corrected minor duration value in .idea/workspace.xml. * Incremented local task counter to reflect changes in task management.

chore: clean up workspace and add libargon2 in Dockerfile
Removed verbose comments from workspace.xml and added libargon2 to Dockerfile. * Cleared unnecessary commit message comments in .idea/workspace.xml. * Included libargon2 in Dockerfile for enhanced cryptographic support.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
